notesShort: This character's ground game is worse than yours. Stay grounded and crouch a bunch to force her to do subpar options in neutral.
Seriously, if you don't stop jumping, you will never beat one. ABK is good.
She is light; don't feel pressured to edgeguard her and risk getting reversaled when you can just Air Slash her at 70.
Keep Up-B oos in mind, as it's really good and hard to punish. Don't be greedy.

She can't kill you early other than an with edgeguard or with a smash attack. Watch out for those as they are very huge. Her smash attacks clank on the ground, but unlike Smash 4, they are transcendent in the air.
She has a hard time dealing with a good ground game and shield play.
Read Tanark's translation of [Rizeasu's Bayonetta Write-Up](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1731l-Vl6F_fQ8GZlsSDgB5msjBmueLxLsSR1yVgz7nM/edit) for more details.
